name: Block Break Falling
description:
Block Break Falling is an amazing block puzzle game. What you need is to move blocks to fill up the specific shape. No need to rotate blocks. It is really sample, fun and addictive. Good for every age of players. The game doesn't have limitation of time. Start to enjoy game!
FEATURES
• Simple rules and Easy control
• Various Blocks and colorful graphic
• Smooth and delicate animation
• Funny sound effects
